title: [Albatross, Foredeck]
description: Sunlight dapples the sweeping foredeck of the riverboat.  Mahogany decking, which is lined with brass railings, is inlaid with a giant rosewood albatross, and is large enough for a pavilion to be erected on its expanse.

Sunlight dapples the sweeping foredeck of the riverboat.  Mahogany decking lined with brass railings has been inlaid with a giant rosewood albatross and is large enough for dancing or even for a pavilion to be erected on its expanse.  An open arch leads into main cabin, and the deck wraps about it to the starboard and port.
